definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: Objective To probe the clinical features and the onset mechanism of epilepsy after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦卒中後癲癎的臨牀特點及發病機制。

sentences.english: Conclusion The combination of surgical operations for the treatment of intractable epilepsy is an effective and safe approach.
sentences.chinese: 結論頑固性癲癎的聯合性手術治療療效確切可靠。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical features of early epileptic seizures (EES) after intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦出血後早發性癲癎發作的臨牀特點。

definition: to bleed from the nose (or from the ears, gums etc)/fig. to be defeated
to hiccup/the humours of the body
scales on the belly of a snake, aiding locomotion/snail/to crawl
